title: Statistics 201a: Introduction to Probability at an Advanced Level
text:
Ed

  DataHub

  Gradescope


No matching items


This course will cover the fundamentals of probability theory at an advance level. Upon reviewing basic undergraduate probability, we will study various concentration inequalities, convergence of random variables, generating functions, limit theorems, multivariate random variables, and stochastic processes.
